name: Blob Quarters
description:
Submission for the GMTK2020 Jam.

Keep the blobs safe in their quarters. If they stray out they lose life and will eventually perish.  Once you lose 5 the game is over.

The game sends your score to a server so you can compare your result against others, can you get the highest score?

Assets used:

  • Main character based off artwork from Pixel Frog in Pixel Adventure 1 – Asset Pack https://pixel-frog.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1
  • Bounce sound - 18 random video game sound effects by bart https://opengameart.org/content/18-random-video-game-sound-effects
  • Music Title screen and in-game https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure
  • Explosion Sound https://opengameart.org/content/9-explosion-sounds
  • Beep Sound https://opengameart.org/content/various-alerts
  • Dash Sound https://opengameart.org/content/windy-sound-2
